comment.body: If you need to know more vocabulary, you can try memrise on android or ios

Don't use or trust 3-party VPN provider, especially free service, you'll never where your data goes to

@Balancer73: Too bad for censorship, I don't know Russia is blocking site, thanks for letting me know.
Anyway, if you want to unblock website, try lantern (sponsored by Google)
https://getlantern.org/
or psiphon (3rd party)
https://www.psiphon.ca/
or even tor (best for anonymous), the first two software/service are well-known to Chinese, who they need to access Google or almost every foreign websites because of the "Great Firewall", so no doubt about unblock websites
